# RoomCaptureSession.Configuration

**Structure**

Settings that configure the room-scanning process.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Configuration
```

## Overview

The `configuration` argument of a room-capture session’s  [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomCaptureSession/run(configuration:)] function is of this type.

## Creating a configuration

- **init()**: Creates a configuration.

## Configuring a session

- **isCoachingEnabled**: An option that indicates that the session periodically provides user instructions.

## Controlling a session

- **run(configuration:)**: Starts a room-capture session with the specified configuration.
- **stop()**: Stops the room-capture session.
- **stop(pauseARSession:)**: Stops the room-capture session and indicates whether the app pauses the underlying AR session.
